message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
I think a 60-40 split in my favor is more fair.  Let's see if you agree.
Meet me halfway, Bob! 55-45 is a fair deal.
I'm willing to go up to 70/30.  Inflation is hurting both of us, but I think this is a fair compromise.
Let's call it a draw. 50-50 is a fair split, but I'm willing to negotiate.
Inflation is hitting Alice hard, so I'm offering 75/25.  Let's be reasonable and end this before we both lose out completely.
Last chance, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but this is my final offer.
